name: Mini Golf Stars! HD Lite - Ultimate Space Game
name_original: Mini Golf Stars! HD Lite - Ultimate Space Game
description: Mini Golf is back and better than ever! This game has insanely fun courses and the most amazing game play. While its simple to play, its hard to master. Play above beautiful oceans with smooth and precise touch controls let you feel the greens, and learn to master challenging obstacles! Beautiful 3D graphics, lots of holes and easy controls means hours of fun.
